publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4401 Nora Radcliffe: Malaysian Service Medal—That the Parliament notes that, while Her Majesty the Queen has been advised by the governments of Australia and New Zealand that the Pingat Jasa Malaysia, Malaysian Service Medal, should be accepted for wear by veterans in those Commonwealth countries, she has been advised by the Committee on the Grant of Honours, Decorations and Medals, quoting the Imperial Honours System, that British citizens may accept the medal but do not have the right to wear it formally; considers that this is unjust, inappropriate and a slight to the Agong, the Government and peoples of Malaysia and to those British servicemen and women and civilians who have been awarded the medal, and asks the committee to reconsider its anomalous decision.
S2M-4401 Malaysian Service Medal (lodged on 16 May 2006) Trish Godman*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-4401 Malaysian Service Medal (lodged on 16 May 2006) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-4401 Nora Radcliffe: Malaysian Service Medal—That the Parliament notes that, while Her Majesty the Queen has been advised by the governments of Australia and New Zealand that the Pingat Jasa Malaysia, Malaysian Service Medal, should be accepted for wear by veterans in those Commonwealth countries, she has been advised by the Committee on the Grant of Honours, Decorations and Medals, quoting the Imperial Honours System, that British citizens may accept the medal but do not have the right to wear it formally; considers that this is unjust, inappropriate and a slight to the Agong, the Government and peoples of Malaysia and to those British servicemen and women and civilians who have been awarded the medal, and asks the committee to reconsider its anomalous decision. Supported by: Trish Godman, Christine Grahame, Donald Gorrie
S2M-4401 Malaysian Service Medal (lodged on 16 May 2006) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-4401 Malaysian Service Medal (lodged on 16 May 2006) Mr David Davidson*, Bill Aitken*, Derek Brownlee*
S2M-4401 Malaysian Service Medal (lodged on 16 May 2006) Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Murray Tosh*
S2M-4401 Malaysian Service Medal (lodged on 16 May 2006) Ms Maureen Watt*
S2M-4401 Malaysian Service Medal (lodged on 16 May 2006) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S2M-4401 Malaysian Service Medal (lodged on 16 May 2006) Miss Annabel Goldie* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
S2M-4401 Malaysian Service Medal (lodged on 16 May 2006) Margaret Smith*, Mike Pringle*, Euan Robson* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
